title: SignedObject is a class for the purpose of creating authentic runtime objects whose integrity cannot be compromised without being detected.

inline_content.Text: SignedObject is a class for the purpose of creating authentic runtime objects whose integrity cannot be compromised without being detected.

title: More specifically, a SignedObject contains another Serializable object, the (to-be-)signed object and its signature.

inline_content.Text: More specifically, a SignedObject contains another Serializable object, the (to-be-)signed object and its signature.
